data.title: A man who sought asylum in the US more than two decades ago, graduated from the University at Buffalo and worked for the New York State Department of Transportation has just been elected president in his homeland of Somalia

Saudi Arabia to issue licenses for women’s gyms this month. Licenses will not be issued for gyms that offer competitive activities, such as football, volleyball, basketball and tennis, Instead be on techniques that contribute to weight loss and fitness, such as swimming, running and bodybuilding.
Mexican health advocates who campaigned against sugary drinks and junk foods reportedly targeted by Israeli-made spyware sold to the Mexican government.

American airstrikes in Afghanistan’s Helmand province may have killed at least 18 civilians, mostly women and children, according to the UN and local sources.
